activities:
1)  Personal information obtained from European consumers using SanDisk's product registration, customer service and technical support services, whether that information is obtained online, offline, or manually processed shall be treated  in accordance with the Safe Harbor principles. 

2)  Personal information relating to identifiable prospective, current or former SanDisk employees, contractors, temps or other workers, in the context of those workers' relationships with SanDisk subject to Global Worker Data Policy Effective:  10/15/2009
